sentences: Lapsed ei saa veel töötada, sest nad on liiga väiksed.
context: The word 'töötada' is an Estonian verb meaning primarily 'to work'. It can be used in various contexts such as employment (working a job), functioning properly (a machine working), or operating (an organization working). The dictionary definition provided seems to be for the related noun 'arst' (doctor) rather than directly defining 'töötada', which suggests this may be an error in the dictionary entry. 'Töötada' is a common verb used daily by Estonians.
